People that want to have this game properly installed to play DotA and are having trouble follow the instructions below:

1. Download the game.
2. Mount it with Daemon Tools, ImgBurn or whatever program you would want to use.
3. Extract the installer from Warcraft III.rar using the password abrar999.
4. Install the game.
5. Download the latest DotA map from http://www.getdota.com/
6. Place it on your maps folder. (Usually C:Program FilesWarcraft IIIMapsDownload)
7. Get the latest patch from here  http://us.battle.net/support/en/article/warcraft-iii-patch-downloads, select Full Patch for The Frozen Throne.
8. Install the patch. (If you are using WinVista/7, right click and run it as Admin.)

- If you have trouble installing the patch or getting an error, go here http://www.playdota.com/forums/showthread.php?t=33279 and follow the steps to fix it.
9. Now you can play and configure it with Garena  or whatever you would want to use.
